original_title: Ashley Haden: We All Die C**ts
overview: Punchy, misanthropic and darkly humorous, Ashley's provocative material tackles all sorts of hot topics from Brexit, the Palestine/Israel Conflict, to privilege and austerity. With a philosophical humour that sticks two fingers up at the intelligentsia, Ashley is the self proclaimed "Genocidal Liberal" who embodies the working class wit breathing life back into an apathetic world.
title: Ashley Haden: We All Die C**ts
